synopsis.text:
At the heart of "Kakushigoto" lies a touching and humorous tale of a single father, Kakushi Goto, and his beloved daughter, Hime. Kakushi, a renowned mangaka, is known for his risqu√© and adult-themed manga series. However, he's determined to keep his profession hidden from his innocent young daughter, fearing her disappointment and disapproval.

With the assistance of his dedicated editors and assistants, Kakushi navigates through a series of comedic and chaotic situations in a desperate attempt to maintain his secret. From disguising himself as a salaryman to conducting emergency drills, Kakushi's life is a constant balancing act between his career and his role as a loving father.

This slice-of-life anime explores the unique bond between Kakushi and Hime, offering a heartwarming blend of laughter, love, and the challenges of parenthood. As time passes, the question remains: will Kakushi be able to keep his secret, or will Hime uncover the truth about her father's work? Join this dynamic duo as they journey through life, hand in hand, in "Kakushigoto."
